doc.title: The one day when ieatishootipost was read by the world
doc.text: It/PRP was/VBD gratifying/JJ to/TO know/VB that/WDT for/IN at/IN least/RB one/CD day/NN ,/, the/DT world/NN was/VBD reading/NN ieatishootipost/NN !/.
